creditline: Gift of Jill Bonovitz and Nancy Hellebrand in honor of their mother, Janet Fleisher
description: primitive style; horizontal composition of procession of figures--two with long, thin arms upraised--and horses with a large white cross at center; city buildings and bridge at left at bottom; hills at bottom at right; multicolored with pinkish ground, with green area at top to left of cross
image_copyright: Copyrighted © Purvis Young. All rights reserved.
provenance: Janet Fleisher Investment Corp., Philadelphia; given to MIA, 2016.
title: City to the Mountain
